short_summary: Ten (10) OTT/OTT HydroMet Water Level Sensor PLS-C, or equivalent
description: Ten (10) OTT/OTT HydroMet Water Level Sensor PLS-C, or equivalent. Data logger compatible communication cable connected, atmospheric pressure compensated submersible pressure probe including pressure, conductivity and temperature sensing elements employing SDI communications used to accurately measure water levels based on differential pressure measurement and density compensated water level calculation.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Solicitation Number: 30005336

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada is soliciting a proposal from pre-qualified suppliers for the supply of (10) OTT/OTT HydroMet Water Level Sensor PLS-C, or equivalent. 

This RFP is issued under the aftermath of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies. Suppliers must have an active Supply Arrangement to be eligible for this solicitation. 

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** 30005336
* **Publication Date:** February 8, 2024
* **Closing Date:** March 19, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

### Mandatory Requirements

- The tendered water level sensor must be an OTT/OTT HydroMet Water Level Sensor PLS-C, or equivalent.
- The instrument must come with a compatible data logger and communication cable, including atmospheric pressure compensated submersible pressure probe with pressure, conductivity, and temperature sensing elements, employing SDI communications.

### Evaluation Criteria

- Bids will be evaluated based on **lowest price**.

### Important Notes

- Suppliers must be pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI to be eligible for this solicitation.
- Any bids received from suppliers not meeting this requirement will not be evaluated.
- Interested suppliers may qualify for the Supply Arrangement at any time by downloading solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and submitting a response as required.

### Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact Stephanie Patry at stephanie.patry@dfo-mpo.gc.ca or (343) 576-8973.

[Attachment: Solicitation Documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31573/30005336---npp.pdf) (French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31573/30005336---apm.pdf)
 

I revised and rephrased the text to improve clarity and professionally format the text. I used proper headings, bullet points, and followed standard convention
